translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, the Honorable Justice Ginsburg.
translation.es: Señoras y señores, la honorable jueza Ginsburg.

translation.en: I hereby declare, on oath...
translation.es: Por la presente, declaro bajo juramento...

translation.en: I hereby declare, on oath.
...I will support and defend the Constitution...
I will support and defend the Constitution.
...against all enemies...
Against all enemies.
...foreign and domestic.
Foreign and domestic.
That I will bear arms...
That I will bear arms.
...on behalf of the United States...  On behalf of the United States.
translation.es: - ...en nombre de los Estados Unidos... - ...en nombre de...

translation.en: ...when required by law.
When required by law.
After the words, We the people of the United States,
translation.es: Luego de las palabras Nosotros, el pueblo de los Estados Unidos,

translation.en: the Constitution sets out the aspiration
to form a more perfect union.
translation.es: de formar una unión más perfecta.

translation.en: We abolished slavery, prohibited racial discrimination,
translation.es: Abolimos la esclavitud, prohibimos la discriminación racial

translation.en: and made men and women people of equal citizenship stature...
translation.es: y establecimos la igualdad de hombres y mujeres como ciudadanos.

translation.en: making ever more vibrant
our national motto...
All right, everybody, uh, good morning.
Good morning.
Nice to see you all.
My name is Samantha Rijkers, and I am originally from the Netherlands.
translation.es: Soy Samantha Rikers y provengo de los Países Bajos.

translation.en: When I started this job, I just felt so excited
translation.es: Cuando empecé aquí, me puse contenta

translation.en: that I could help fellow immigrants also become citizens.
translation.es: de ayudar a otros inmigrantes a convertirse en ciudadanos.

translation.en: Since we are going to be spending a lot of time together,
I always think it's nice for all of us to get to know each other a little bit.
translation.es: me parece buena idea presentarnos para conocernos un poco.

translation.en: All right.
- Who's ready to go first? -
My name is Dipna,
I'm from Mexico,
- like my blouse. -
I came here since 1989, so do the math.
translation.es: Vine al país en 1989, así que saquen las cuentas.

translation.en: I want to apply for a citizenship
because we came for better opportunities,
for freedom.
Things are changing,
something can happen with only the residence.
translation.es: Algunas cosas pasan solo con los residentes.

translation.en: We have to become a citizens,
that's why.
I came here to United States in 2012.
translation.es: Vine a los Estados Unidos en 2012.

translation.en: I was granted political asylum
because I was suffering persecution from the Venezuelan government.
translation.es: porque sufría la persecución del gobierno venezolano.

translation.en: And I would like to become citizen.
For two reasons.
First of all, because I think, uh...
this is the way to say thank you...
to this wonderful country.
And second, because I love democracy and liberty.
translation.es: Y, además, porque me encantan la democracia y la libertad.

translation.en: I'm from Colombia.
I've been here about 21 years.
I come because I fell in love with him, my husband.
translation.es: Vine porque me enamoré de él, mi marido.

translation.en: And, you know, it's time to be a citizen,
translation.es: Llegó la hora de pedir la ciudadanía

translation.en: because we love this country and we are scared about the future.
translation.es: porque amamos este país y nos da miedo el futuro.

translation.en: We want to be a part of the citizen, so the next time we can vote.
translation.es: Queremos ser parte del país para poder votar la próxima vez,

translation.en: We can have the rights. We can have the voice. We can count.
translation.es: para tener derechos y voz, para que nuestra decisión cuente.

translation.en: I want to become US citizen because I much appreciate freedom.
translation.es: Quiero ser ciudadano estadounidense porque valoro mucho la libertad.

translation.en: There is no freedom in China, and people are also suffering there.
translation.es: En China, no existe la libertad. El pueblo está sufriendo.

translation.en: If you say something, you will suffer some persecutions.
Here, we can spread the freedom to-- to-- to other place.
translation.es: Desde aquí, podemos propagar la libertad hacia otros lugares.

translation.en: That's why I want to become American citizen here.
translation.es: Por eso, quiero ser ciudadano estadounidense.

translation.en: - Yeah, that's why. - Thank you.
Follow me. We're going to our first painting.
translation.es: Síganme. Vamos hasta el primer cuadro.

translation.en: What did you notice?
If you want to pass the citizenship test,
translation.es: Para aprobar el examen de ciudadanía,

translation.en: immigrants have to study 100 questions
about American history and government, and they will be asked
translation.es: sobre historia y gobierno. Les harán un máximo de diez preguntas.

translation.en: up to ten of those.
translation.es: Les harán un máximo de diez preguntas.

translation.en: They have to answer six correctly to pass.
translation.es: Para aprobar, deben responder bien seis.

translation.en: Native Americans, soldiers...
There's soldiers also in the back.
Those questions are about history, civics.
translation.es: Las preguntas son sobre historia y cívica

translation.en: They have to understand how the US government works.
translation.es: para saber cómo funciona el gobierno del país.

translation.en: And for people who did not grow up in this country, who did not go to school in this country,
translation.es: Para los que no crecieron aquí ni estudiaron en este país,

translation.en: that is very challenging.
Who are the different people in this painting? And the other group...
translation.es: ¿Quiénes son los del cuadro? ¿Y el otro grupo?

translation.en: How can we study history using paintings and artifacts?
translation.es: ¿Cómo podemos estudiar historia con cuadros y utensilios?

translation.en: What do you see in this painting?
It's winter.
- How do you know it's winter? - It's snowy.
And there's guns.
Guns. What else?
- Families, children, babies. - Yeah.
They're guiding them to somewhere.
translation.es: Él los conduce a alguna parte.

translation.en: - They're going somewhere. - Church.
translation.es: - Van a algún lado. - La iglesia.

translation.en: How do you know they're going to church?
- Well, because of the pastors. - The priest.
What is the family carrying?
- Books. - Books.
- Probably Bibles. - Bibles.
- Yes. - They're looking for something.
Yeah. What-- What could they be looking for?
Like, for a place?
Mm- hmm. Somewhere to go?
Maybe they're taking them to a place of safety.
translation.es: Quizá los lleva a un lugar seguro.

translation.en: Maybe it's unsafe. What could be the danger?
translation.es: O están en peligro. ¿Cuál podría ser el peligro?

translation.en: Maybe they're coming back from...
participating in some sort of religious... - Event. - ...event, yeah.
translation.es: luego de participar en una especie de evento religioso.

translation.en: So, it is dangerous for them to go.
translation.es: Entonces, es peligroso que ellos vayan.

translation.en: So if they're going to church and it is dangerous,
translation.es: Si van a la iglesia aunque sea peligroso,

translation.en: what does that tell us about these people?
They're not able to freely demonstrate their religion.
translation.es: Que no son libres de mostrar su religión.

translation.en: This painting is called Pilgrims Going to Church.
translation.es: Este cuadro se llama Peregrinos camino a la iglesia.

translation.en: And they came here for freedom.
translation.es: Vinieron aquí en busca de libertad.

translation.en: But specifically, freedom of religion. All right?
And that's what we can see here.
translation.es: Es lo que representa el cuadro.

translation.en: What kind of question do they ask,
translation.es: ¿Qué clase de pregunta hacen, dentro de las 100,

translation.en: you know, in the 100 questions that will be related to this painting?
translation.es: ¿Qué clase de pregunta hacen, dentro de las 100, relacionada con este cuadro?

translation.en: What is one reason colonists came to America?
translation.es: Mencionen un motivo por el que los colonos vinieron a los EE. UU.

translation.en: - Religion. - Freedom, religion...
translation.es: - Por la religión. - La libertad de religión.

translation.en: Okay.
Already know one of the 100 questions. Right? We're good to go.
translation.es: Ya sabemos una de esas 100 preguntas. Podemos seguir.

translation.en: This is a time of great insecurity for many immigrants in our nation.
translation.es: Es una época muy insegura para los inmigrantes del país,

translation.en: Even for lawful permanent residents like many of you.
translation.es: hasta para los residentes legales, como muchos de ustedes.

translation.en: Can you tell me how is it that you got your green card?
translation.es: ¿Puede decirme cómo consiguió su permiso de residencia?

translation.en: Did they do that in the office, or did you have to go to the court?
translation.es: ¿Se lo dieron en una oficina o tuvo que ir a juicio?

translation.en: Court, ma'am, in the court.
One of the things that's great about becoming a US citizen
translation.es: Lo maravilloso de la ciudadanía estadounidense

translation.en: is that it gives you a certain amount of freedom.
Once you become a citizen, they can't take it away from you.
translation.es: Una vez que te la otorgan, no pueden quitártela.

translation.en: Can you read, write, and speak basic English?
translation.es: ¿Sabe leer, escribir y hablar un inglés básico?

translation.en: - Yeah, I can write, I can read. - Very good.
Have you ever been ordered, removed,
excluded or deported from the United States?
translation.es: o no lo dejaron entrar en el país?

translation.en: Have you ever had any kind of military or weapons training?
Are you willing to bear arms on behalf of the United States?
Yes.
If law requires it, are you willing to perform...
translation.es: Si la ley lo exige, ¿está dispuesto a...?

translation.en: I think my greatest happiness is that I could come to America
translation.es: Mi mayor felicidad es haber podido venir a los Estados Unidos

translation.en: and become an American citizen.
Look at the painting.
What did you notice?
People getting hurt...
Yeah, they tried to, like, take down the horse...
It's a horse. What else can you tell about the statue?
The king. Right?
- How do you know it's a king? - The crown.
translation.es: - ¿Cómo saben que es rey? - Por la corona.

translation.en: The crown, right?
Yeah, it's King George III of England.
translation.es: Es el rey Jorge III de Inglaterra.

translation.en: So, on July 9th of 1776,
the Declaration of Independence reached New York City.
translation.es: la Declaración de Independencia vino a Nueva York.

translation.en: It took five days for news to travel from Philadelphia,
translation.es: La novedad tardó cinco días en llegar de Filadelfia, donde fue escrita, a Nueva York.

translation.en: where it was written, to New York.
translation.es: en llegar de Filadelfia, donde fue escrita, a Nueva York.

translation.en: They got so excited,
a small group of George Washington's soldiers
translation.es: que algunos soldados de George Washington

translation.en: ran down to the statue of King George III.
When they got to the statue, they started pulling it down.
translation.es: Cuando llegaron, se pusieron a derribarla.

translation.en: If you look up, you can see
that's the real statue's horse's tail that survived.
translation.es: verán la cola del caballo real, que sobrevivió.

translation.en: - Oh! - It's right up there.
So, let's bring it back to the test.
When was the Declaration of Independence adopted?
translation.es: ¿Cuando se aprobó la Declaración de Independencia?

translation.en: - July. - July 4th.
It's July 4th, but it took until July 9th
translation.es: El 4 de julio. Bueno, la gente de Nueva York recién se enteró el 9 de julio.

translation.en: for people in New York City to find out about it.
translation.es: Bueno, la gente de Nueva York recién se enteró el 9 de julio.

translation.en: So the answer is July 4th, 1776.
translation.es: La respuesta es: El 4 de julio de 1776.

translation.en: This is what it would have sounded like if you were at the Common on July 9th, 1776.
translation.es: Esto habrían escuchado si hubiesen estado en el parque el 9 de julio de 1776.

translation.en: We hold these truths to be self- evident,
that all men are created equal,
translation.es: que todos los hombres son iguales,

translation.en: that they are endowed by their Creator with certain unalienable Rights,
translation.es: que son dotados por su Creador de ciertos derechos inalienables,

translation.en: that among these are Life, Liberty and the Pursuit of Happiness.
translation.es: que entre estos están la vida, la libertad y la búsqueda de la felicidad.

translation.en: Human beings are not willing to live in a locked- up space.
translation.es: Los seres humanos no están dispuestos a vivir encerrados.

translation.en: They aspire to live in a free terrain.
They aspire to have, for example, the right to religion,
translation.es: Aspiran a tener, por ejemplo, el derecho a la religión...

translation.en: the right to expression, the right to freedom.
translation.es: ...el derecho a la expresión, el derecho a la libertad

translation.en: And the right to live in an unrestrained environment.
translation.es: y el derecho a vivir en un lugar donde no los controlen.

translation.en: A poem goes like this,
“Life is dear, love is dearer.
translation.es: La vida es algo preciado, el amor lo es más,

translation.en: Both can be given up for freedom.”
translation.es: pero se pueden ceder ambos a cambio de la libertad.

translation.en: Freedom is a person’s highest pursuit.
translation.es: La libertad es el mayor anhelo de cualquiera.

Hello!
Uh- uh. Nothing.
We're gonna play a game.

translation.es: - Una subasta de esclavos. - Una mujer...

translation.es: Enseguida dijiste: Subasta de esclavos. ¿Cómo sabes que es eso?

translation.en: - Public auction. - It says sales.
- Great sale. - Great Sale.
Great sale of horses, cattle, Negroes and other farm stock
translation.es: Gran venta de caballos, ganado, negros y otras existencias

translation.en: this day at public auction.
What else? What is he wearing?
- Just casual kind of clothes. - Mm- hmm.

translation.en: What about the woman? Have we come to a consensus?
Have we agreed on what her role is in all this?
translation.es: ¿Sabemos cuál es su papel en todo esto?

translation.es: Parece preocupada. Probablemente piensa que le quitaran a sus hijos.

translation.en: that the boys are going to be taken from her.
translation.es: Probablemente piensa que le quitaran a sus hijos.

translation.en: Yeah, that was a very, um... - Worry. - ...real possibility
translation.es: Sí, eso realmente podía pasarles a muchas familias.

translation.es: Sí, eso realmente podía pasarles a muchas familias. Podían separarlos.

translation.es: Quizá cada miembro tenía diferentes compradores,

translation.es: Quizá cada miembro tenía diferentes compradores, y los separaban.

translation.es: A través del arte, John Rodgers mostró...

translation.es: Bueno, lo usó para expresarse políticamente.

and that people were being treated like animals. Right?
translation.es: y que trataban a las personas como animales.

translation.es: Hasta dijeron literalmente que eran como los demás animales.

torture, killing,
badly hurting a person on purpose...

translation.en: No. Got it, all right.

translation.es: ¿Alguna vez formó parte, prestó servicio, ayudó o participó de alguna manera

Thanks.

translation.es: y por qué quiere ser parte de él.

translation.es: El gobierno del país decidió añadir preguntas

translation.es: sobre la esclavitud y la Guerra Civil porque esa es la historia estadounidense.

Um, so...
what did Martin Luther King Jr. do?

translation.es: Y también luchó por la igualdad de todos los estadounidenses.

translation.en: Yeah.
I'm going to show you a video of a part of a speech that he gave.
translation.es: Les mostraré un fragmento de un discurso que dio.

translation.en: How long will it take?
Somebody’s asking,
How long will prejudice blind the visions of men?
translation.es: ¿Cuánto más nublará el prejuicio la vista de los hombres?.

translation.en: How long? Not long.
Because the arc of the moral universe is long,
translation.es: Porque el arco del universo moral es largo,

translation.en: but it bends toward justice.
translation.es: pero se dobla hacia la justicia.

translation.en: - How long? Not long! - Not long.
As humans, we are never perfect. We have our shortcomings.

However...
America’s political system, belief system...
translation.es: ...el sistema político y las creencias de este país...

translation.en: are trying to overcome these shortcomings.
Its political system is moving towards the right direction.
translation.es: El sistema político se dirige hacia la dirección correcta.

translation.es: Al verlo, se entiende por qué se convirtió en un líder tan importante.

and there were so many things we couldn't discuss today,
translation.es: Hay cosas que no pudimos hablar hoy.

translation.es: Los afroamericanos lucharon por la igualdad de muchas maneras.

translation.en: were fighting for equality and still are today.
translation.es: Los afroamericanos lucharon por la igualdad de muchas maneras. Hoy siguen luchando.

translation.en: The final thing we have to do is just cover some of the questions.
What movement tried to end racial discrimination?

translation.es: El movimiento por los derechos civiles.

translation.en: So civil means of the people.
Jian Zhang.
I came to the US in 1999
translation.es: Vine a los Estados Unidos en 1999

translation.en: to do my doctoral study in physics.
translation.es: para hacer un doctorado en Física.

translation.en: And now, I’ve been accepted as a member of the society.
translation.es: Me aceptaron como miembro de la sociedad.

translation.en: I feel that all my years
translation.es: Creo que, al fin, reconocieron que yo haya pasado tantos años

translation.en: of admiring America's value system have finally been valued.
translation.es: Creo que, al fin, reconocieron que yo haya pasado tantos años admirando el sistema de valores estadounidense.

translation.en: All my years of yearning its value system have been valued.
translation.es: Reconocieron todos mis años de anhelar su sistema de valores.

translation.en: I am now part of the American society.
translation.es: Ahora soy parte de la sociedad estadounidense.

translation.en: Behind me, you see the eagle,
translation.es: Detrás de mí, ven el águila,

translation.en: the symbol of the United States of America.
translation.es: el símbolo de los Estados Unidos de América.

translation.en: We are a beautiful and substantive and powerful nation
translation.es: Somos una nación hermosa, sólida y poderosa...

translation.en: because of what you have contributed
and because of what you will contribute.
Just what is this sacred liberty
that must lie in the hearts of men and women?

translation.es: El espíritu de la libertad es el espíritu

translation.en: which is not too sure it is right.
translation.es: que no está seguro de estar bien.

translation.en: The spirit of liberty
is the spirit which seeks to understand
translation.es: es el espíritu que busca comprender

translation.en: the minds of other men and women without bias.
translation.es: la mente de los hombres y de las mujeres sin ser parcial.

translation.en: May the spirit of liberty be your beacon
translation.es: Que el espíritu de la libertad sea su guía

translation.en: as you play your part in helping to achieve
translation.es: mientras juegan su papel para ayudar a lograr

translation.en: a more perfect union.
Albania, Algeria, Argentina,
Australia, Burkina Faso, Canada, China, Denmark,
translation.es: Australia, Burkina Faso, Canadá, China, Dinamarca,

translation.en: Dominican Republic, Ecuador, El Salvador, Georgia.
translation.es: República Dominicana, Ecuador, El Salvador, Georgia.

translation.en: We're all from somewhere else.
We are a nation made strong by people like you.
translation.es: Somos una nación fortalecida por personas como ustedes,

translation.en: People who have traveled long distances
overcome great obstacles,
all to provide a better life
translation.es: en busca de una vida mejor

translation.en: for themselves and their families.
translation.es: para ustedes mismos y su familia.

translation.en: Please, raise your right hand and repeat after me.
translation.es: Levanten la mano derecha y repitan después de mí.

translation.en: - I hereby declare... - I hereby declare.
- ...on oath... - On oath.
- ...that I absolutely... - That I absolutely.
- ...and entirely... - And entirely.
- ...renounce and abjure... - Renounce and abjure.
- ...all allegiance and fidelity... - All allegiance and fidelity.
To any foreign prince...  To any foreign prince.
- ...State, or sovereignty... - State, or sovereignty.
And that I take this obligation freely...
And that I take this obligation freely.
- So help me God. - So help me God.
translation.es: - Que Dios me ayude. - Que Dios me ayude.

translation.en: Yay, we did it!
